title: Ear Wax Removal Experts in the UK & Ireland - Ear Wax Clinic
description: Discover the UK's leading ear wax removal clinics, offering expert audiologist services and advanced techniques like microsuction and syringing. Book now for optimal ear health and personalised care.
rawContent:
Welcome to UK's premier ear wax removal website, operated by highly skilled audiologists and hearing care professionals dedicated to optimising your ear health. We specialise in a range of effective wax removal methods, including microsuction, manual removal, and gentle syringing with water irrigation, ensuring your ears are meticulously cleaned and cared for. 

 

Our ear health experts help you maintain a clear ear canal, free from excess wax buildup that can lead to blockages and impact your hearing needs. We provide personalised assistance as well as guidance on natural remedies such as olive oil ear drops to soften earwax and syringes to use at home.

 

Booking an appointment at one of our clinics is straightforward and convenient; simply check for your nearest clinic, give the number a call, and schedule by phone. Visit one of our earwax clinics today and let our dedicated professionals help you achieve optimal hearing health and well-being.

Find Your Local Ear Wax Removal Clinic & Call Directly

Over 150 Qualified & Registered Ear Wax Removal clinics Specialising in Microsuction Around the UK & Ireland.

Over 1,000,000 ears cleared by the Ear Wax Clinic in the UK & Ireland

Find Your Local Ear Wax Removal Clinic & Call Directly

Over 90% of microsuction earwax removal professionals in the UK and Ireland that offer microsuction earwax removal have been trained by us. We're trusted by both professionals and the public to take care of your ears.


Many people are discovering that their local NHS medical centre no longer provides ear syringing, also known as ear irrigation, or has long waiting times. This is undoubtedly due to a lack of funding, but the fact that ear syringing is inherently less safe than ear microsuction has also played a role. Many people have been injured as a result of the ear syringing procedure, which is why we try not to provide it as a service unless it is absolutely appropriate.

 

Ear infection, hearing loss, tinnitus, perforation of the ear drum, and further impaction of the ear wax are all possible side effects of ear syringing or irrigation, i.e., the ear wax gets pushed even harder against the ear drum. Is it any surprise that people are avoiding walk-in ear syringing in favour of microsuction ear wax removal?

 

"Going private" is now far less expensive than it was, with many hearing centres now offering it as a service. Our patients have repeatedly told us that the money they paid was well worth it for the relief of finally being able to hear properly without waiting for an NHS appointment. Why not bypass the line by "going private"?

Click on the map to find your local Ear Wax Removal Clinic

"I can hear again"

 

"Fantastic service, best money I ever spent. Thank you! Very professional young man - will tell all my family and friends about this clinic. My husband wants me to make an appointment for him - will do that as soon as we get back from hols. Thank you I can hear again.

Chose this clinic because my doctors no longer offer this service, my nearest clinic on NHS was Whitegate Drive. This clinic was 5 mins from my home. My impression of this clinic was very professional man, will use again. Thank you."

 

JANET, LYTHAM.

Convenient Locations

We have hundreds of ear wax clinics across the UK and Ireland, so we are never that far.

No-wait Appointments

Most of our ear wax clinics have same-day appointments when you need them.

Easy Contact

Call the earwax removal clinic and speak directly to an expert who can help.


No Clumsy Ear Syringing

Microsuction and irrigation are both safe, quick, and comfortable ways to clean your ears without making a mess or syringing your ears.

Qualified Ear Professionals

Our strict selection process makes sure that you get the best care possible and have access to a network of top ear care specialists who have been hand-picked.

Certified & Registered

The largest, longest established and most trusted UK & Ireland network of qualified microsuction wax removal & canal cleaning specialists


Ear Microsuction Specialists

We specialise in the microsuction ear wax removal technique for removing ear blockages. This is generally accepted to be the safest and most effective method of ear wax removal, and it is completely syringe free with no need for weeks of softening with oil. The procedure commonly takes a few minutes for each ear. In some rare cases, ear syringing can still be effective, and some of our audiologists may still recommend and use this procedure where appropriate.

Local & Professional

Carried out at one of our many convenient ear wax clinics or in your home, we charge from £40 for one ear and £60 for both ears (unless otherwise stated on the Ear Wax Clinic Locations page). Some ear wax removal clinics are able to make emergency evening and weekend appointments. A few ear wax removal specialists also offer home visits for an additional fee. There will be a video otoscopic examination before and after the procedure to show you the results. If the problem isn't a blocked ear, then a hearing test may be carried out and/or referral advice may be given, charged at the normal appointment rate.

Registered & Insured

Safety is paramount, and the ear wax removal procedure should always be comfortable and pain-free. We carefully select fully qualified and registered experienced ear care professionals who are also trained to The Hearing Lab's standards as well as their registering body's standards. If they have not been trained by The Hearing Lab, this is because they have been previously trained by another Hearing Lab-recognised training provider. We have also worked closely with insurance providers to make sure our practitioners and their patients are fully covered.


Find your local Ear Wax Clinic
